des: "Very rich and chocolaty mousse made in a blender. Garnish with whipped cream. This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs."
ins: In blender container, combine chocolate chips, sugar and eggs.  Pour in hot milk and brandy. Blend on medium speed until this mixture is smooth.  Pour into 8 demitasse cups or pots de creme. Chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour.
